TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExtensibleClassFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 啟用在建立期間從 Unmanaged 物件延伸的 Managed 物件的自訂。

span.span: Enables customization of managed objects that extend from unmanaged objects during creation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ExtensibleClassFactory`可讓使用者指定`delegate`，稱為建構的執行階段可呼叫包裝函式 (RCW) 提供基本的 COM 物件的執行個體的期間。The `ExtensibleClassFactory` allows users to specify a `delegate` that is called during construction of a runtime callable wrapper (RCW) that provides an instance of the underlying COM object. 作用中，回呼會做為包裝 RCW 的 COM 物件的 class factory。In effect, the callback acts as the class factory for the COM object wrapped by the RCW. 沒有回呼，通用語言執行平台，請建立呼叫的基礎 COM 物件`CoCreateInstance`。Without the callback, the common language runtime creates the underlying COM object by calling `CoCreateInstance`. 此回呼會提供啟動基礎物件，例如，COM moniker 或藉由提供單一物件的替代方式。This callback provides an alternative way of activating the underlying object, such as with a COM moniker or by providing a singleton object. 必須在呼叫的方法`static`RCW 擴充之類別初始設定式。The method must be called in the `static` initializer of the class that is extending the RCW. 只有一個物件建立回撥允許每個物件類型。Only one object creation callback is permitted per object type. 啟動可延伸的 RCW 時，註冊回呼。When the extensible RCW is activated, the callback is registered. 必須先建立基礎 COM 物件，提供物件的參考會呼叫回呼。When the underlying COM object needs to be created, the callback is called to provide a reference to the object. 回呼必須傳回`IUnknown`基底物件的介面指標。The callback must return an `IUnknown` interface pointer for the base object. ## Examples 註冊`delegate`，將會從 unmanaged 類型延伸受管理類型的執行個體需要配置彙總的 unmanaged 的物件時呼叫。Registers a `delegate` that will be called whenever an instance of a managed type that extends from an unmanaged type needs to allocate the aggregated unmanaged object. 這`delegate`必須配置，並彙總未受管理的物件，稱為取代`CoCreateInstance`。This `delegate` is expected to allocate and aggregate the unmanaged object and is called in place of a `CoCreateInstance`. 必須在內容中呼叫此常式`static`初始設定式進行回呼類別。This routine must be called in the context of the `static` initializer for the class for which the callbacks will be made. [!code-cpp[Classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterObjectCreationCallback(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ObjectCreationDelegate callback) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterObjectCreationCallback (callback As ObjectCreationDelegate)

span.span: A that is called in place of .

summary.span: 登錄從 Unmanaged 型別延伸的 Managed 型別的執行個體需要配置匯總的 Unmanaged 物件時會呼叫的 。

span.span: Registers a that is called when an instance of a managed type, that extends from an unmanaged type, needs to allocate the aggregated unmanaged object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`delegate`配置和未受管理的物件進行彙總並呼叫取代`CoCreateInstance`。This `delegate` allocates and aggregates the unmanaged object and is called in place of `CoCreateInstance`. 這`delegate`必須登錄的內容中`static`類別初始設定式進行回呼。This `delegate` must be registered in the context of the `static` class initializer for which the callbacks will be made. 在階層中的只有一個類別應該註冊`delegate`回呼。Only one class in an hierarchy should register a `delegate` callback.
